channel.title: Deernadia
channel.description: Deernadia is a hearthston twitch streamer on twitch. Come join us at twitch.com/deernadia

item.title: Welcome to The BLOG!
item.description:
HELLO EVERYONE, This is the new Blog,Where Nadia will post news and other related posts. For now the blog will stay like this with the new comment system below and the basic blog posts. I will keep improving the blog in deernadia.com until we have the best blog for the community. I will also change the design often to make the blog prettier and more organized!.

GO CHECK OUT deernadia on twitch here!
